heroDescription: We're here to help. Contact us for immediate support.
successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
errorMessage: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Feel free to contact us for any inquiries or assistance

booking.question: How can I book an appointment?
booking.answer: You can book an appointment through the website or app with simple steps

availability.question: Is the service available 24/7?
availability.answer: Yes, booking and technical support services are available around the clock

cancellation.question: How can I cancel an appointment?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel appointments from My Appointments page 24 hours before the appointment

support.question: How can I get technical support?
support.answer: You can contact technical support via phone, email, or live chat
